title: Created Lyrics for Tahm Kench's theme
body:
Matched to the humming:

Take me to the river
To where my riches lay
Take me down the river
And don't forget to pray

Cuz I'm going down
Got a debt to pay
And it won't be goin' away

Meetin' with a broker
He's got a lot to say

Gonna make me richer
In every single way

But I see now, Everything...
and I know I can't get away...

Maybe it needs some finagling, maybe some touching up, but I swear Tahm's theme could be turbo if it had some lyrics. I can't wait to see if anyone adds them to the theme.

replies.body:
Hey that's pretty good man. I bet a Rioter will notice :3
*puts out bacon*

I do what I can, sometimes it's enough :P

I'm sure the bacon will help out though...

> [{quoted}](name=Friggin Paco,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=vOj7E3vA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-12T16:29:27.697+0000)
>
> I do what I can, sometimes it's enough :P
> 
> I'm sure the bacon will help out though...

Did someone say bacon?

Honestly though, this is really cool.  I've been sat at my desk, mouthing the words as I listen to the music!  I can't get the last two lines to match up though - it may be that I'm putting the wrong stresses on the syllables?  Can you maybe help me out on how those two lines work?

Damn, this Rioter is too small, gotta throw him back in.

*Changes to Canadian Bacon*

For the last two lines, since they kind of lend themselves to be the "outro", the part at at 1:30 has the tail end of the melody has a long note that slides down, that's the held "Eh" of Everything (But I see now, Eeeeevrything).

As for the last line, "And I know I cant, get away", split "I can't" into two smaller, faster, notes. Then, the last words should be following the humming as per usual.

I would say honestly, why don't you try getting ahold of Falconshield on youtube and at least see it they'd entertain your idea?
I was really disappointed that I didn't hear any lyrics when the update hit cause tunes in this style beg for a good lyric.

To be honest I was kind of doubting this lyric idea, because Tahm's tune was quite amazing already. However this is truly a work of art, and the lyrics just fit Tahm so well. I really hope LOL changes the theme and adds the lyrics or Falconshield does this because it deserves a lot of spotlight my good sir!

D'aww, you're too kind! I don't typically get this motivated to write lyrics to a song I like, but I really felt like it should get some. 

Also, I've sent an Email to Falconshield just now. We can only wait!
